text:
üõí Greenmart is a neighborhood supermarket located in Bedok North, Singapore. They offer home delivery services, and their selection includes a variety of products such as fresh fruits, vegetables, frozen meat, dairy, beverages, instant noodles, rice, condiments, sauces, cleaning supplies, and more.

Additionally, they have Indian food products imported directly from India. You can find them at 88 Bedok North Street 4, #01-147, Singapore 4600881. Happy shopping! üõçÔ∏è

I recently picked up my parcel at Bedok North (Green Mart) and was disappointed by the service I received. The Chinese woman working there, who appeared to be in her late 40s to early 50s, had a poor attitude. When I arrived to collect my item within the collection timing, she gave me a disapproving look. Today, as I stood quietly waiting for her to assist me, she angrily sorted parcels into a trash bag. When she finally addressed me, she did so with hostility, slapping the trash bag and demanding my pin number. Despite her rude behavior, I remained composed, provided my pin number, retrieved my parcel, thanked her, and left without receiving any acknowledgment in return. Buyers like us do not deserve this.

This store is good but there is a staff member that is indian and has a mullet haircut. He keeps on hugging my children without my consent. Now my children does not like going to greenmart. Besides from that, you have to wait 5-15 minutes if you want to collect your parcel because usually there is no one there.

Worst service by the boss himself! If you‚Äôve read the other reviews on the so-so customer service by the staff, just want to share that the boss is even more horrendous.

Never gonna use the store as a Shopee collection point anymore, and definitely not patronising as a customer!
I am Burmese, but I really like the taste of this restaurant. Everyone at the restaurant is so nice. Thank you very much for preparing the best food.
